summary: Retexture of the Nord Hero Weapons craftable at skyforge
descriptionHtml:
Sorry if my English is not the best ;)
When reforging very old Weapons, the first thing I would replace´, is the wood. I found the Textures of the nord-hero weapons always too \"one-coloured\", so here´s my retexture with brown leather and wood.

To Install. just extract the .rar file with WinRar or 7zip and copy the \"textures\"- folder into Your Skyrim/Data directory ;)

Please also check out my other mod that removes the green color from ancient nordic weapons ;)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20821/?tab=3&navtag=/ajax/comments/?thread_id=733961|:|mod_id=20821

....also, I don´t know if this works with dawnguard because I don´t own it yet....
author: Nick
